Module HW05
Package model

Class BallModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.BallModel
  • public class BallModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that manages the creation, deletion and animation of the balls.
    Author:
    Peter Dulworth (psd2), Andrew Hadad (aah6)

    • Field Detail

      • m2vAdapter

        private IM2VAdapter m2vAdapter
        The model-to-view adapter is initialized to a no-op to insure that system always has well-defined behavior.

      • myDispatcher

        private IDispatcher<IBallCmd> myDispatcher
        The dispatcher that keeps track of the balls and sends them commands.

      • timeSlice

        private int timeSlice
        The delay between events for the timer.

      • timer

        private javax.swing.Timer timer
        The timer. Used to update the GUI every "timeSlice" milliseconds.

      • switcher

        private SwitcherStrategy<IBallCmd> switcher
        Single instance of the switcher strategy shared by all switcher balls.

      • _errorStrategyFac

        private IUpdateStrategyFac<IBallCmd> _errorStrategyFac
        A factory for a beeping error strategy that beeps the speaker every 25 updates. Either use the _errorStrategyFac variable directly if you need a factory that makes an error strategy, or call _errorStrategyFac.make() to create an instance of a beeping error strategy.

      • updateStrategyLoader

        ObjectLoader<IUpdateStrategy<IBallCmd>> updateStrategyLoader
        Object loader that loads IUpdateStrategy's.

      • _errorPaintStrategyFac

        private IPaintStrategyFac _errorPaintStrategyFac
        A factory for a beeping error strategy that beeps the speaker every 25 updates. Either use the _errorStrategyFac variable directly if you need a factory that makes an error strategy, or call _errorStrategyFac.make() to create an instance of a beeping error strategy.

      • paintStrategyLoader

        ObjectLoader<IPaintStrategy> paintStrategyLoader
        Object loader that loads IPaintStrategy's.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BallModel

        public BallModel​(IM2VAdapter m2vAdapter)
        The BallModel constructor. Creates a new BallModel by taking an adapter.
        Parameters:
        m2vAdapter - Constructor is supplied with an instance of the model-to-view adapter.

    • Method Detail

      • loadUpdateStrategy

        private IUpdateStrategy<IBallCmd> loadUpdateStrategy​(java.lang.String strategyName)
        The following method returns an instance of an IUpdateStrategy, given a fully qualified class name (package.classname) of a class that implements IUpdateStrategy. The method assumes that there is only one constructor for the supplied class that has the same *number* of input parameters as specified in the args array and that it conforms to a specific signature, i.e. specific order and types of input parameters in the args array.
        Parameters:
        strategyName - A string that is the fully qualified class name of the desired object.
        Returns:
        An instance of the supplied class.

      • loadPaintStrategy

        private IPaintStrategy loadPaintStrategy​(java.lang.String paintStrategyName)
        The following method returns an instance of an IUpdateStrategy, given a fully qualified class name (package.classname) of a class that implements IUpdateStrategy. The method assumes that there is only one constructor for the supplied class that has the same *number* of input parameters as specified in the args array and that it conforms to a specific signature, i.e. specific order and types of input parameters in the args array.
        Parameters:
        paintStrategyName - A string that is the fully qualified class name of the desired object.
        Returns:
        An instance of the supplied class.

      • makeBall

        public void makeBall​(IUpdateStrategy<IBallCmd> updateStrategy,
                     IPaintStrategy paintStrategy)
        The following method creates an instance of an Ball (with random parameters), given a shortened class name (model.XXXStrategy) of a update strategy. It then adds the ball as an observer to the dispatcher.
        Parameters:
        updateStrategy - The update strategy of the ball.
        paintStrategy - An IPaintStrategy for the new ball to use.

      • switchSwitcherStrategy

        public void switchSwitcherStrategy​(IUpdateStrategy<IBallCmd> newStrategy)
        Sets the strategy of the switcher to newStrategy.
        Parameters:
        newStrategy - The new strategy to give the switcher.

      • clearBalls

        public void clearBalls()
        The following method removes all ABalls from the dispatcher.

      • update

        public void update​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This is the method that is called by the view's adapter to the model, i.e. is called by IV2MUpdateAdapter.paint(). The following method notifies all the balls in the dispatcher (which in turn calls the update method of each ball) and passes each update method the correct Graphics object to paint on.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics object from the view's paintComponent() call.

      • start

        public void start()
        The following method starts the model by starting the timer.

      • makeUpdateStrategyFac

        public IUpdateStrategyFac<IBallCmd> makeUpdateStrategyFac​(java.lang.String className)
        Returns an IUpdateStrategyFac that can instantiate the strategy specified by className. Returns a factory for a beeping error strategy if className is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the className.
        Parameters:
        className - Shortened name of desired strategy.
        Returns:
        A factory to make that strategy.

      • makePaintStrategyFac

        public IPaintStrategyFac makePaintStrategyFac​(java.lang.String className)
        Returns an IPaintStrategyFac that can instantiate the strategy specified by className. Returns a factory for a beeping error strategy if className is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the className.
        Parameters:
        className - Shortened name of desired strategy.
        Returns:
        A factory to make that strategy.

      • fixName

        private java.lang.String fixName​(java.lang.String folder,
                                 java.lang.String className,
                                 java.lang.String append)
        Converts a shortened class name (XXX) to a fully qualified class name (folder.XXXappend).
        Parameters:
        folder - The name of the folder for fully qualified class name.
        className - The abbreviated, shortened name.
        append - The string to append to the end.
        Returns:
        The fully qualified class name.

      • combineStrategyFacs

        public IUpdateStrategyFac<IBallCmd> combineStrategyFacs​(IUpdateStrategyFac<IBallCmd> stratFac1,
                                                        IUpdateStrategyFac<IBallCmd> stratFac2)
        Returns an IUpdateStrategyFac that can instantiate a MultiStrategy with the two strategies made by the two given IUpdateStrategyFac objects. Returns null if either supplied factory is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the toString()'s of the two given factories, concatenated with "-". If either factory is null, then a factory for a beeping error strategy is returned.
        Parameters:
        stratFac1 - An IUpdateStrategyFac for a strategy
        stratFac2 - An IUpdateStrategyFac for a strategy
        Returns:
        An IUpdateStrategyFac for the composition of the two strategies

      • getSwitcherStrategy

        public SwitcherStrategy<IBallCmd> getSwitcherStrategy()
        Returns:
        The switcher field.
